channel.title: Next Generation (317 loading 508) (Flawless)
channel.description:
[center] [img]http://s7.postimage.org/it2adozez/Untitled_1.gif[/img]
[img]http://i40.tinypic.com/70xs2a.png[/img][url=http://www.ng-forums.com/NextgenerationBH.rar]Download Client (Direct)[/url]
[img]http://i40.tinypic.com/70xs2a.png[/img][url=http://www.mediafire.com/?qb0sdnzwqg1z0bz][i](Client Dl - Mirror)[/i][/url]
[img]http://highscores.worldscapeblitz.com/images/overall.gif[/img][url=http://www.ng-forums.com/smf/index.php/board,64.0.html]Highscores[/url]
[img]http://i42.tinypic.com/k9zyix.png[/img][url=http://www.ng-forums.com]Forums[/url]
[FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=5]Features[/SIZE][/FONT] [i][b]-Flawless PvP Combat (Magic, Melee, Range). -Flawless NPC Combat (Perfect npc animations, Perfect Gfx). -Bounty hunter cash reward system (To claim right click the banker and select "Collect" -Bounty Hunter point system (Includes shop) -Old school feel, nice game frame, perfect for hybriding -100% weapon poison system -Anti farming systems -Working clan chat (includes Lootshare) -Flawless bounty hunter (Targets, Requirements, Leave Pens, Pickup Pens, multi system, everything) -Flawless hybrid economy setup (We have plan's and have a great economy setup) -Stunning barrage orbs (With put up a gif image later) -Dragon bolt effects (proper gfx) -Stunning 508 maps with the potential for great minigames such as clan wars. -PK Following (Range/Mage/Melee) All Perfect -8.25GB Dedicated Server -View equipment stats proper interface -Half/Full Tb's -D Spear Fully Working -Avas backpack is fully working with its effect -Full Dueling system -Fully working void armor (Mage/Range/Melee) All has an effect[/b][/i] + Many many more!
[FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=5]Pictures:[/SIZE][/FONT] [img]http://i45.tinypic.com/2drtog7.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/4g0mx3.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/14m6ty9.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/16bkqpt.png[/img] [img]http://ng-forums.com/awesome.gif.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/hwiszo.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/28rjdis.png[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/1HMRi[/img] ][IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/15zqknb.png[/img]
[FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=5]Client problems?[/SIZE][/FONT] Then you more than likely need this java [url=http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/jdk7-downloads-1880260.html]Java SE Downloads[/url] If it is still not working post here [url=http://www.ng-forums.com/smf/index.php/board,58.0.html]Server Discussion[/url] [/center]

item.title: Next Generation (317 loading 508) (Flawless)
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

Why hasn’t anyone fixed the Minimap Updating problem when it becomes locked in the Barrows Minigame? That’s the only flaw I can see in the Client, besides the Minimap Hint Icon size being incorrect.

EDIT: Warriors Guild Scenery & Bounty Hunter as well, but that’s to be expected.

On Topic: Looking good, keep it up.

Read full topic

item.title: Next Generation (317 loading 508) (Flawless)
item.dc:creator: @loved loved
item.description:
@loved wrote:

[center]

Untitled_1.gif728×90

Download Client (Direct)

(Client Dl - Mirror)

Highscores

Forums

[FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=5]Features[/SIZE][/FONT]
-Flawless PvP Combat (Magic, Melee, Range).
-Flawless NPC Combat (Perfect npc animations, Perfect Gfx).
-Bounty hunter cash reward system (To claim right click the banker and select “Collect”
-Bounty Hunter point system (Includes shop)
-Old school feel, nice game frame, perfect for hybriding
-100% weapon poison system
-Anti farming systems
-Working clan chat (includes Lootshare)
-Flawless bounty hunter (Targets, Requirements, Leave Pens, Pickup Pens, multi system, everything)
-Flawless hybrid economy setup (We have plan’s and have a great economy setup)
-Stunning barrage orbs (With put up a gif image later)
-Dragon bolt effects (proper gfx)
-Stunning 508 maps with the potential for great minigames such as clan wars.
-PK Following (Range/Mage/Melee) All Perfect
-8.25GB Dedicated Server
-View equipment stats proper interface
-Half/Full Tb’s
-D Spear Fully Working
-Avas backpack is fully working with its effect
-Full Dueling system
-Fully working void armor (Mage/Range/Melee) All has an effect

  • Many many more!
